name: .FFD
summary: Learn about .FFD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can use an FFD file to resume the saved game it contains in FATE (Windows). To do so, first place the file in FATE's SAVE directory. Then, open FATE, select Continue Game, and select the saved game your FFD file contains.

You can also use various FFD editing tools, such as FATE Save Editor, to modify the save data an FFD file contains. For example, FATE Save Editor allows you to edit your character's stats, skills, items, and spells.
